title: Did more than 500 Caravangers have been arrested for suicide?
subtitle: "ISIL soldiers" are armed with suicide vests and disguised as convoy asylum-seekers are the product of the invention of "Klepter."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: More than 500 members of a convoy of asylum-seekers travelling through Mexico to the American border in San Diego were arrested and had suicide belts.
